[R Chess](http://jkunst.com/rchess/): mainly a wrapper of [chessjs](https://github.com/jhlywa/chess.js).

[chess](https://curso-r.github.io/chess/): R wrapper around python-chess.

[bigchess](https://github.com/rosawojciech/bigchess): (1) R package for interacting with PGN Files and (2) an R API to UCI Chess Engines.
